ing: 18 slices pepperoncini peppers, drained, or to taste
n: Salami, Cream Cheese, and Pepperoncini Roll-Ups
des: "A great snack and appetizer to bring to any party! I have so many people requesting I make these every time we come over!"
ins: Spread about 1 1/2 teaspoon softened cream cheese over a slice of salami; top with 1 to 3 slices of pepperoncini pepper. Roll the salami around the cheese and pepper; secure with toothpick. Repeat with remaining ingredients; serve immediately.
